sources.title: A Murder Of Innocence | Full Crime Drama Movie
sources.description:
A Murder Of Innocence - Based on a true story, a community is rocked by the double-homicide of a prominent couple and the local police struggle to find the killer. As a darkness settles over the town, Albert, the new resident pastor must help his church and family overcome the aftershocks by providing stability, healing and hope while his wife Aimee must come to grips with her own fear through her faith.
2018. Stars: Rachel MacMillan, Frank Chiesurin, Xander Steel
**Under license from Vision Films Inc. All rights reserved**

As a darkness settles over the town, Albert, the new resident pastor must help his church and family overcome the aftershocks by providing stability, healing and hope while his wife Aimee must come to grips with her own fear through her faith.
